customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(3)
	self.meta.visible = False

transforms.code: return [{'value': value.getValueAt(i,"id"), 'label': value.getValueAt(i,"name")} for i in range(value.getRowCount())]

messageHandlers.script:
if(payload['result'] is not None and len(str(payload['result'])) > 0):
		self.props.value = round(float(payload['result']))

config.script:
if self.parent.custom.enabled:
		system.perspective.openPopup(
				"calc_store_add",
				"1_TEMPLATES/Calculator",
				{
					'calcStrInitial': str(self.getSibling("NumericEntryField").props.value),
					'messageHandler': "storeTransactionAddResult",
					'popupId': "calc_store_add",
					'forcePositive': True
				},
				title="Add Transaction")

messageHandlers.script:
if(payload['result'] is not None and len(str(payload['result'])) > 0):
		self.props.value = round(float(payload['result']))

config.script:
if self.parent.custom.enabled:
			system.perspective.openPopup(
					"calc_store_deduct",
					"1_TEMPLATES/Calculator",
					{
						'calcStrInitial': str(self.getSibling("NumericEntryField").props.value),
						'messageHandler': "storeTransactionDeductResult",
						'popupId': "calc_store_deduct",
						'forcePositive': True
					},
					title="Deduct Transaction")

logger = system.util.getLogger("CampusStore_AddTransaction")
				
	#category = self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("InputContainer").custom.categorySelected
#	category = self.parent.parent.getChild("CategoryFlex").getChild("Dropdown").props.value + 1
	category = self.parent.parent.getChild("CategoryFlex").getChild("Dropdown").props.value
#	category = self.parent.parent.getChild("CategoryFlex").getChild("Dropdown").props.value
	canAdd = self.parent.parent.getChild("AddFlex").getChild("NumericEntryField").props.enabled
	canDeduct = self.parent.parent.getChild("DeductFlex").getChild("NumericEntryField").props.enabled
	addVal = self.parent.parent.getChild("AddFlex").getChild("NumericEntryField").props.value
	#addVal = int(self.parent.parent.getChild("AddFlex").getChild("TextField").props.text)
	deductVal = self.parent.parent.getChild("DeductFlex").getChild("NumericEntryField").props.value
	participantId = self.view.params.participantId
	notes = self.parent.parent.getChild("NotesFlex").getChild("TextField").props.text
	system.perspective.print(category)
	valid = True
	if notes is None:
		notes = ''			
				# Ensure a participant is selected
	if(participantId is None or len(str(participantId)) <= 0):
		logger.warn("Transaction can not be added as no participant is selected")
		valid = False
#		return
				
				# Ensure a category is selected
	if(category is None) or category<1:
		logger.warn("Transaction can not be added as no category is selected")
		valid = False
#		return
#	system.perspective.print(valid)				
				# calculate delta and ensure it is allowed for selected category
	logger.info("%s %s" % (addVal, deductVal))
	delta = int(addVal) - int(deductVal)
	#system.perspective.print('one click works')
	if((delta > 0 and not canAdd) or (delta < 0 and not canDeduct)):
				logger.warning("Transaction of category %s doesn't permit a transaction value of %d." % (category.name, delta))
				return
					
				# Insert transaction
	if valid:
		system.db.runNamedQuery(
			"Participants/CampusStore/InsertTransaction",
			{
				'participantId': participantId,
				'transactionPoints': delta,
				'categoryId': category,
				'notes':notes
			})
		system.perspective.print(category)	
	elif valid == False:
#		system.perspective.print("error1")		
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("DetailsContainer").getChild("ErrorMessage").getChild("Label").showMessage('Please select Category')
#		system.perspective.print("error2")		
	self.parent.parent.parent.parent.getChild("TransactionHistory").refreshBinding("props.data")
	self.view.refreshBinding("custom.participant.points")
	
	
	self.parent.parent.getChild("AddFlex").getChild("NumericEntryField").props.value = 0
	self.parent.parent.getChild("DeductFlex").getChild("NumericEntryField").props.value = 0
	self.parent.parent.getChild("NotesFlex").getChild("TextField").props.text = ''
	self.parent.parent.getChild("CategoryFlex").getChild("Dropdown").props.value = -1
	self.props.enabled = False
	#system.perspective.print('one click works')

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(3)
	self.meta.visible = False

value.race: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Island
Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Island

transforms.code:
tableData = []
	
	for iRow in range(value.getRowCount()):
		
		col_category = value.getValueAt(iRow, 'Category')
		col_t_stamp = value.getValueAt(iRow, 'timeCreated')
		
		delta = value.getValueAt(iRow, 'TransactionPoints')
		col_add = delta if delta >= 0 else None
		col_deduct = abs(delta) if delta < 0 else None
		
		col_total = value.getValueAt(iRow, 'TotalPoints')
		notes = value.getValueAt(iRow, 'Notes')
		eventDate = value.getValueAt(iRow,'eventDate')
		row = [col_category, col_t_stamp, col_add, col_deduct, col_total, notes, eventDate]
		tableData.append(row)
	
	headers = ["category", "t_stamp", "add", "deduct", "total", "notes","eventDate"]
	return system.dataset.toDataSet(headers, tableData)

messageHandlers.script:
if(payload['participantId'] is not None):
		self.view.params.participantId = payload['participantId']
